Rulings.Base: 1. You can activate this effect during either player's turn.\n2. (This ruling is outdated per the revised Damage Step Rules released by Konami that says you can only activate effects in Damage Calculation that specifically say they may be activated in Damage Calculation)  - You can activate this effect during damage calculation.
